text: Ngenxa yokwaphula kwabo umnqophiso wabo nangenxa yokungazamkeli kwabo iiVesi zika-Allâh, nangenxa yokugwinta kwabo abaProfeti ngokungekho lungelweni, nangenxa yokuthi: “Iintliziyo zethu ziqanyangelwe”. Nakanye, uAllâh Ufake itywina ezintliziyweni zabo ngenxa yokungakholwa kwabo, ke kaloku abakholwa bona ngaphandle njee kokukancinane
